tv.generator-info-name: Processed by Open-EPG Visual Processor v1.0

programme.title: Boss Level
programme.desc: Action star Frank Grillo leads an all-star cast in this slugfest. Trapped in a time loop that repeats the day of his murder, a former special-ops agent must uncover how he died.

programme.title: The Curse Of The Necklace
programme.desc: A sinister 1960s-set horror. Attempting to win his wife back, a cop gifts her an antique necklace, which is a conduit for an evil spirit that puts their daughters in danger.

programme.title: Half Baked: Totally High
programme.desc: The hilarious sequel to the 1998 cult classic. Three potheads sell a strain of magical weed to raise funds for their friends funeral, but their business angers a ruthless drug dealer.

programme.title: The Edge Of Existence
programme.desc: With this documentary, South African filmmakers James Suter and Charlie Luckock reveal a complex story of how civilisation and the wilderness coexist on a knife-edge in Africa.

programme.title: The Caine Mutiny Court-Martial
programme.desc: The late Oscar-winning director William Friedkin adapts Herman Wouks Pulitzer Prize-winning novel. A young lieutenant is accused of a mutiny against his captain.

programme.title: The Lost Girls
programme.desc: Inspired by the classic tale of Peter Pan, but with a feminist twist. Four generations of Darling women struggle with the aftermath of their adventures in Neverland.

programme.title: Guardians Of Time
programme.desc: A fantasy film filled with adventure. Four cousins discover a passage leading to a mysterious world. Trapped in the Kingdom of Keoherus, they must confront the Guardian of Time.

programme.title: Two Buddies And A Badger: The Great...
programme.sub-title: Two Buddies And A Badger: The Great Big Beast
programme.desc: In this exciting sequel, the two tunnel-dwelling friends venture to find Captain Knutsen to help them save their tunnel.

programme.title: Gracie and Pedro: Pets To The Rescue
programme.desc: A fun, furry animated adventure. Family frenemies, Gracie and Pedro, must put their differences aside, embarking on a thrilling quest in order to reunite with their owners.

programme.title: Bernard: Mission Mars
programme.desc: A funny, heartfelt space adventure animation for the family. An unlucky agent secretly infiltrates a Mars mission to catch a Martian monster but ends up befriending it.

programme.title: Elevation
programme.desc: From the creators of A Quiet Place comes a gripping, intense post-apocalyptic story. Alongside two women, a father goes on a dangerous mission to save his sons life.

programme.title: Flight Risk
programme.desc: Things are not as they appear in this thriller from Mel Gibson. On a small plane, a US Marshal escorts a government witness, but the pilot (Mark Wahlberg) turns out to be an assassin.

programme.title: Unbreakable Boy
programme.desc: Zachary Levi stars in this heartfelt, inspiring film based on a real-life story of a familys struggles and triumphs as they care for their autistic son with brittle bone disease.

programme.title: Joker Folie A Deux
programme.desc: A match made in madness as Lady Gaga joins Joaquin Phoenix to create a potent sequel of music and chaos. Struggling with his dual identity, Arthur meets the love of his life in prison.

programme.title: Cuckoo
programme.desc: An eerie and unsettling horror thriller. After a 17-year-old girl moves to live with her father at a cabin resort, she soon discovers something isnt right.

programme.title: Wicked Little Letters
programme.desc: A witty period dramedy. A rowdy Irish migrant is accused of sending letters full of hilarious profanities to the people of Littlehampton. Suspicious, the towns women investigate.

programme.title: Drive-Away Dolls
programme.desc: A hilarious crime comedy. Two very different friends in search of a fresh start embark on an unexpected road trip. Things go awry when they cross paths with a group of criminals.

programme.title: Sumotherhood
programme.desc: Its a chaotic comedy-of-errors in this British crime comedy. Two hapless friends run into trouble after an attempted bank robbery goes wrong.

programme.title: Sins In The Family
programme.desc: A gripping family drama. Zaras perfect life crumbles when her adopted daughters counsellor confesses she is her daughters birth mom.

programme.title: Conni: Secret Of Mau The Cat
programme.desc: A charming animation. Connis cat Mau follows her on her kindergarten trip, causing mayhem, confusion and laughs. The children are kept busy hiding Mau from the teachers.

programme.title: Noahs Ark
programme.desc: This musical animation follows the adventures of two mice who attempt to board Noahs Ark with the help of an ingenious cockroach and sheer luck.

programme.title: Panda Bear In Africa
programme.desc: A charming animated adventure. A panda must cross the world, facing hippos, hyenas, and gorillas. He must rescue his kidnapped dragon friend and protect his new friends home.

programme.title: Transformers One
programme.desc: With an all-star voice cast, this action-packed prequel follows the untold origin story of Optimus Prime and Megatron, whose relationship changed the fate of Cybertron forever.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 4
programme.desc: Po is chosen to become the spiritual leader of the Valley of Peace in the fourth instalment. He must train a new Dragon Warrior while a wicked sorceress plans to re-summon master villains.

programme.title: 10 Lives
programme.desc: A charming and hilarious animation. After losing his ninth life, a pampered and selfish cat is offered a chance to make amends with nine new lives as a different creature each time.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About The Boy
programme.desc: The fourth instalment in the popular romcom franchise. Back in the dating game, single mom and widow Bridget is pursued by a younger man and maybe her sons science teacher.

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: A riveting action comedy. A realtor is pulled back into his old life by his former partner-in-crime. With his crime-lord brother also on his trail, he must confront his past.

programme.title: High Ground
programme.desc: An action-packed thriller. A border town sheriff faces a brutal cartel after a mysterious prisoner is brought into his jail.

programme.title: Den Of Thieves: Pantera
programme.desc: A high-stakes sequel. Big Nick gets ensnared in the treacherous world of diamond thieves and the notorious Panther Mafia as he pursues the elusive career criminal Donnie Wilson.

programme.title: Knox Goes Away
programme.desc: Michael Keaton stars and directs this thriller about redemption. A contract killer with dementia is offered a chance to redeem himself by saving the life of his estranged son.

programme.title: Marked Men: Rule Shaw
programme.desc: Opposites attract in this romantic drama. Two different people are attracted to each other, but after a night, neither can forget, they are worried it might destroy their love.

programme.title: 300: Rise Of An Empire
programme.desc: A thrilling sequel to the hit film 300. Greek general Themistokles (Sullivan Stapleton) leads his men into battle against the Persians after the inspiring acts of the fallen Spartans.

programme.title: Hustle and Flow
programme.desc: This explosive film won an Oscar for Original Song and earned Terrence Howard a nomination for his electric performance. Follow a pimp trying to escape the life through hip-hop.

programme.title: Psycho II
programme.desc: The sequel to Alfred Hitchcocks 1960 classic. After 22 years in an asylum, killer Norman Bates is declared sane and returns to the hotel where he committed his gruesome deeds.

programme.title: Ray
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx gives an Oscar winning performance in this biographical drama. A child with an extraordinary talent suffers a tragedy but his music eventually takes the world by storm.

programme.title: Evan Almighty
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman plays God again, in this comic adventure about a modern-day man (Steve Carell) who is asked to prepare for the Biblical great flood. A spin-off of 2003s Bruce Almighty.

programme.title: Liar Liar
programme.desc: Golden Globe winner Jim Carrey learns hard lessons in this comedy. After being lied to by his lawyer father, a boy makes a wish for him to stop lying, and the wish comes true.

programme.title: Cradle 2 The Grave
programme.desc: Jet Li plays a Taiwanese intelligence officer who teams up with a thief for a rescue operation in this slick action crime thriller from the director of Romeo Must Die.

programme.title: The Lord Of The Rings: The Two Towers
programme.desc: Peter Jacksons epic tale gets even better as the fellowship and the hobbits battle to overcome impossible odds to complete their tasks.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed And...
programme.desc: Sandra Bullock returns as FBI Agent Gracie Hart in this comedy, and this time she investigates the disappearance of the new Miss United States.

programme.title: Gremlins
programme.desc: A wild roller-coaster ride of hilarious mischief. A boy gets an unusual pet but he must follow 3 rules. When he violates them, he unleashes a horde of little monsters on his town.

programme.title: Sonic The Hedgehog
programme.desc: This live-action video game adaptation features Jim Carrey as the villain. Now living on Earth, Sonic teams up with a police officer to help him fight an evil scientist.

programme.title: Kandahar
programme.desc: Gerard Butler fights against the odds in this war movie. A CIA operative and his translator flee from special forces in Afghanistan after exposing a covert mission.

programme.title: Long Shot
programme.desc: In this hilarious rom-com, a romance brews between Seth Rogen and Charlize Theron when a presidential candidate hires a neighbour from her childhood as her speechwriter.

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Mark Wahlberg and Seth MacFarlane team up again for an insane furry sequel. Ted and his new wife want a family, but first, he must prove that hes a person in a court of law.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: This stunning drama was nominated for eleven Oscars. Whoopi Goldberg leads an all-star cast in this story of one womans journey of survival and triumph through adversity.

programme.title: The Marry Me Pact
programme.desc: A delightful romance film. A woman visits a psychic who tells her she is destined to be with her male best friend. However, he returns home engaged after his travels.

programme.title: Rent A Groom
programme.desc: A delightful romantic comedy. To please her sickly grandma, a woman hires an actor to pretend to be her fiance, but their simple ruse develops into something serious.

programme.title: The Lord Of The Rings: The Return...
programme.sub-title: The Lord Of The Rings: The Return Of The King
programme.desc: Good takes on evil in this Oscar-winning epic. The hobbits try to destroy the One Ring while a war is waged for Middle-Earth.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Aaron Taylor-Johnson stars in this visually spectacular update of the monster classic, as he must save his loved ones from the raging battle between the two giant monsters.

programme.title: E.T. The Extra-Terrestrial
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg created a sci-fi masterpiece that wowed a generation. A child befriends an alien and tries to help to it escape Earth and return to its planet.

programme.title: Bean
programme.desc: Britains beloved Mr Bean gets his first movie. More hilarious and bumbling antics ensue when Bean is dispatched to LA to deliver an extremely valuable painting.

programme.title: Mr. Beans Holiday
programme.desc: The BAFTA-winning Rowan Atkinson reprises his role as the legendary Mr Bean. This time around, chaos follows him on holiday to France.

programme.title: Godzilla X Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: The epic battle continues. This time, the mighty Kong and the fearsome Godzilla must unite against a colossal undiscovered threat hidden within the planet.

programme.title: Monkey Man
programme.desc: This heart-pounding and brutally sweet revenge thriller follows the journey of Kid, whos played by Dev Patel. Hes on a quest for justice against those who took everything from him.

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: Ice Cube, Jennifer Lopez and Jon Voight star in this classic action-adventure. A crew of filmmakers meets a stranded man who forces them to join his quest to catch a deadly snake.

programme.title: Blue Streak
programme.desc: Martin Lawrence stars in this crime comedy. An ex-con pretends to be a cop in order to retrieve a diamond he stashed in a police station, but gets caught up in something bigger.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: Tom Cruise and Jamie Foxx have a night filled with danger in this thriller. When an unfortunate cab driver picks up an assassin, he becomes trapped in a game of death.

programme.title: Scream 3
programme.desc: When Sidney and gang visit the set of a movie ominous things start to happen and it isnt long before Ghostface is back in this third outing in the popular horror franchise.

programme.title: The Constant Gardener
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, widower Justin Quayles quest for answers leads him to explosive secrets.

programme.title: Unstoppable: The Rebecca Nagel Story
programme.desc: This incredible documentary tells the story of Rebecca Nagel, whose car accident left her an L1 paraplegic. She became the first female to complete a half marathon trail event.

programme.title: Intolerable Cruelty
programme.desc: George Clooney and Catherine Zeta-Jones go toe-to-toe in this confrontational romcom. A divorce lawyer meets his match in the form of his clients gold-digging wife.

programme.title: Back To The Dinosaurs
programme.desc: An exciting sci-fi adventure. Two youngsters find a mysterious spacecraft that transports them into the dinosaurs era, needing them to race against time to return home.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game Of Shadows
programme.desc: Robert Downey Jr and Jude Law return for another action-packed mystery. This time Holmes is on the trail of Professor Moriarty who is committing crimes across Europe.

programme.title: Spirit: Stallion Of The Cimarron
programme.desc: This Oscar nominee for Best Animated Feature film sees a young mustang stallion become the leader of his herd. But when he is captured, hes forced to fight for his freedom.

programme.title: Beethoven
programme.desc: If you love dogs then youll enjoy Beethoven, a giant St. Bernard who lives with a doting family. Unfortunately, Beethoven has also attracted the attention of a sinister vet.

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: Alec Baldwin lends his voice talent to this off-beat animation. A 7-year-old boys life is turned upside down at the arrival of a suit-wearing, briefcase-carrying baby.

programme.title: Puss In Boots: The Last Wish
programme.desc: Antonio Banderas returns as the swashbuckling cat. Puss in Boots is down to the last of his nine lives. So he sets out to restore them by finding the mythical Last Wish.

programme.title: Into The Storm
programme.desc: Its man versus nature in this thrilling disaster film. A group of storm chasers and the residents of a small town try and survive a tornado superstorm.

programme.title: The Bone Collector
programme.desc: Denzel Washington and Angelina Jolie face a great evil in this crime thriller. A paralyzed forensics expert and a young cop must work together to stop a brutal serial killer.

programme.title: Breaking In
programme.desc: Gabrielle Union is fierce in this captivating thriller. When her two kids are taken hostage after a break-in, a mother must do everything to save them.

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Djimon Hounsou drive this thriller about redemption. A mercenary entangled in illegal diamonds decides to help a fisherman trying to save his family.

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: Theres no rest for the haunted Lambert family in this horror sequel. They must race to uncover a childhood secret thats made them dangerously connected to the spirit world.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Five US Marines find themselves on the wrong side of enemy lines in a rescue mission gone awry. As they try to get back, they suspect they are being used as decoys.

programme.title: Let Us Make Eve
programme.desc: A chilling thriller. Friends, bound together by a murder they committed as teens, journey to celebrate their friendship in Belize, but they dont know their lives are in danger.

programme.title: Veronica Mars
programme.desc: Fans of the TV show are in for a treat as Kristen Bell reprises her role as a former teen sleuth. Now a qualified lawyer, Veronica returns to her hometown to investigate a murder.

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: This adorable movie earned multiple Oscar nominations, including for Best Picture. A farm piglet embarks on a career in sheepherding, with some surprising and spectacular results.

programme.title: Spud 3: Learning To Fly
programme.desc: The third instalment of the South African tale follows a now sixteen-year-old Spud Milton (Troye Sivan) who must navigate the difficulties of being a senior at boarding school.

programme.title: Playmobil The Movie
programme.desc: An awesome animation, inspired by the Playmobil toy brand. When her younger brother disappears into the colourful and animated world of Playmobil, Marla is forced to rescue him.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: Classic animated adventure for everyone. A cranky green ogre with a heart of gold leaves his swamp for the first time, and learns that the outside world isnt as bad as it seems.

programme.title: Wonder Park
programme.desc: Dreams come true in this magical animation. A girl, with a wild imagination, wakes up to find herself in her own Wonder Park, but the park needs her help to save it.

programme.title: The Croods
programme.desc: A star-studded cast ensures this Academy Award-nominated classic will amuse adults and kids alike. A prehistoric family goes on the journey of a lifetime

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: Mark Wahlberg and Rose Byrne star in this great comedy about family. A couple bites off more than they can chew when they adopt three foster children.

programme.title: Fences
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars alongside Viola Davis, who earned an Oscar for her role. This 50s drama navigates the complex relationship of a working-class African-American family.

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson and Karl Urban star in this action horror based on a video game classic. Space marines are sent to investigate a research station but find unspeakable horrors.

programme.title: Ma
programme.desc: Octavia Spencer is terrifying in this horror. A lonely woman befriends a group of teens and allows them to use her home for parties, but she has very sinister intentions for them.

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 3
programme.desc: This instalment of this horror franchise sees a psychic, reluctantly agree to use her ability to contact the dead in order to help a girl, targeted by a deadly supernatural entity.

programme.title: The Gentlemen
programme.desc: Guy Ritchie directs a star-studded cast in this crime drama. An American expat tries to sell off his highly profitable marijuana empire in London, putting a target on his back.

programme.title: Wrath Of Man
programme.desc: Guy Ritchie and Jason Statham team up again to deliver this gritty action film. A mysterious and fierce new cash truck security guard has a hidden vengeful agenda.

programme.title: American Night
programme.desc: Expect carnage, explosions, gunfights, and car chases in this intense star-studded thriller. A shady art dealer crosses paths with a mob over a stolen iconic painting.

programme.title: Perfectly Single
programme.desc: A conservative and socially awkward optometrist takes a leap of faith with a young suitor. Soon, her journey leads her down a path to self-discovery.

programme.title: Twisted Vines
programme.desc: A murder mystery that will keep you guessing. A wedding at a vineyard estate turns deadly when a body is discovered, and all the guests turn into suspects.

programme.title: Shamed
programme.desc: A delightful romcom. A magazine editor goes on an island trip to clear her mind and focus on her infamous Shamed List column, only to fall for one of the men on her List.

programme.title: Mosley
programme.desc: An enchanting family animation. Mosley rebels from a life of servitude to uncover the origins of his species after learning that his fellow thoriphants used to stand upright.

programme.title: How The Grinch Stole Christmas
programme.desc: Dr. Seuss How The Grinch Stole Christmas. Jim Carrey plays the infamous Grinch, a creature who hates Christmas and plots to steal it.

programme.title: The Nut Job 2: Nutty By Nature
programme.desc: A silly adventure ensues for Surly the squirrel in this fun sequel. When the mayor of Oakton City plots to destroy their home, Surly and his friends must do all they can to stop him.

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic...
programme.sub-title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: Kevin Hart lends his voice to this colourful superhero animation. Two pranksters hypnotise their principal into believing hes a superhero.

programme.title: The Courier
programme.desc: Oscar nominee Benedict Cumberbatch leads this high-stakes Cold War spy thriller. A British businessman joins forces with a Soviet officer to defuse the Cuban Missile Crisis.

programme.title: Fall
programme.desc: A nail-biting survival thriller. After climbing an abandoned 2000-foot radio tower, best friends Becky and Hunter find themselves trapped at the top with no way down.

programme.title: Fortress 2: Snipers Eye
programme.desc: The sequel to the action cyber thriller Fortress. Weeks after the deadly assault on Fortress Camp, Robert (Bruce Willis) makes a daring rescue to save the widow of his old nemesis.

programme.title: Fast and Furious 9
programme.desc: Having escaped the clutches of Charlize Theron, Dom and the crew are now faced with the emergence of his estranged brother, played by John Cena, in this exciting ninth instalment.

programme.title: Spiral From The Book Of Saw
programme.desc: This Saw spin-off adds a new twist while keeping the franchises brutality. Detective Zeke Banks (Chris Rock) tries to track down a Jigsaw copycat killer who targets cops.

programme.title: The Goldfinch
programme.desc: A book-inspired drama about a young boy who lost his mother in a terrorist attack. He has a coveted painting stolen before the tragedy as a memento of his mothers death.

programme.title: Blinding Lights
programme.desc: A young aspiring female singer struggling with addiction wants to make it big in the Atlanta music scene. She decides to overcome the strikes she has against her family.

programme.title: The Ex Obsession
programme.desc: An accidental death leads to stolen identity when a woman coerces her husband to assume her dead exs identity. Their desperate cover-up spirals into obsession.

programme.title: All Saints Christmas
programme.desc: A delightful holiday movie. When a popular RandB singers picture of her and her ex is misinterpreted as an engagement, her family insists he joins her on her trip back home.

programme.title: Aliens Abducted My Parents And Now...
programme.sub-title: Aliens Abducted My Parents And Now I Feel Kinda Left Out
programme.desc: A sci-fi comedy. A teen girl helps her space-obsessed neighbour to find his parents, whom aliens might have abducted.

programme.title: The Nutcracker And The Magic Flute
programme.desc: The classic Nutcracker tale gets a refreshing twist. As Marie wishes to escape her troubles, she shrinks to the size of her toys, which all come to life.

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: This adorable animation with an ensemble cast explores the world inside our phones, where emojis live and one multi-expressional emoji heads off on an adventure to discover his purpose.

programme.title: Abominable
programme.desc: An exciting animated adventure. An encounter with a Yeti, targeted by a rich man, sets teenage Yi and her two friends on an adventure to return the magical creature to his home.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: When the murderous Lord Shen threatens China with a terrifying new weapon, Po must face a truth he never expected and defeat Shen for the good of Kung Fu.

programme.title: Muzzle
programme.desc: In this action movie, Aaron Eckhart takes on the criminal underworld. While investigating his partners murder, an LAPD K-9 officer uncovers a vast conspiracy.

programme.title: Copshop
programme.desc: Gerard Butler leads a great ensemble cast in this action thriller. A wily con artist running from an assassin devises a scheme to hide inside a small-town police station.

programme.title: The Hitmans Bodyguard
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds and Sam Jackson dive headfirst into action for this chaotic comedy. A low-level bodyguard reluctantly agrees to protect a crazy hitman with valuable testimony.

programme.title: Hitmans Wifes Bodyguard
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds and Samuel L. Jackson return as Michael and Darius respectively. The two continue their friendship as they try to save Darius wife, Sonia (Salma Hayek).

programme.title: Nobody
programme.desc: Emmy-winning actor Bob Odenkirk leads this action thriller as an unassuming man who is driven to the edge after a home invasion. He goes into a rage to protect his family.

programme.title: Black Warrant
programme.desc: Oscar nominee Tom Berenger stars in this action-packed thriller. A semi-retired assassin and DEA agent team up to stop a cyber terrorist organisation.

programme.title: Deadly DILF
programme.desc: A compelling thriller. A harmless flirtation between a college girl and the hot dad next door turns deadly when she becomes obsessed with him and tries to destroy his marriage.

programme.title: Landman
programme.desc: Tommy gets connected to the National Guard. Rebecca becomes increasingly suspicious of Cooper.

programme.title: Teacup
programme.desc: Ruben and James seek help from the Navarros, Arlo reveals the truth about whats going on.

programme.title: Dexter: Resurrection
programme.desc: In this pulsating premiere, Dexter Morgan awakens from a ten-week coma. As he begins a painful recovery and learns Harrison has fled to NYC.

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: This week looks at Presidential libraries, Pete Hegseth summoning 800 generals to Quantico, and I.C.E. raid incidents in Chicago.

programme.title: Steinheist
programme.desc: The abrupt resignation of CEO Markus Jooste and the catastrophic crash of Steinhoff leaves many across South Africa and the world baying for Joostes blood.

programme.title: Reyka
programme.desc: The promise ring found on Portias finger links the investigation back to Speelman. He hides out in a hotel but finds himself the target of unwanted attention. The first female victim is identified.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen
programme.desc: Joel McHale (Community) hosts this outrageous culinary guessing game where bakers must decode what type of dessert was made when all thats left are the crumbs, flour trails, and a few elusive clues.

programme.title: 1972: Munichs Black September
programme.desc: A powerful, explorative documentary that looks at the truth about the tragic massacre at the 1972 Olympic Games in Germany, through interviews.

programme.title: Happys Place
programme.desc: After Gabbys latest heartbreak, Bobbie and Isabella decide to throw a Ladies Night at the tavern to show Gabby she doesnt need a man to be happy, but things dont go as planned.

programme.title: Americas Got Talent
programme.desc: In the 20th season of this Emmy-nominated reality competition, the search continues for the countrys best talent. Howie Mandel, Sofía Vergara, and Simon Cowell return, joined by Mel B.

programme.title: Chicago Med
programme.desc: Ripley struggles to rescue a woman and her daughter trapped in an abandoned well. Frost is caught off guard by the arrival of an old friend from his TV days.

programme.title: Summertide
programme.desc: Yolande and Tristans bond strengthens leading up to opening night. Emily is rushed to the hospital. Rebecca deals with the aftermath of her restaurant being trashed.

programme.title: Summertide
programme.desc: Tristan supports Yolande through her recovery. Wilma and Jack organize a community event for Christmas. Emily and Gavin face a miscarriage. Freddy quits his security job.

programme.title: Watson
programme.desc: Watson runs into a brilliant con artist and an old friend of Sherlock Holmes, Irene Adler, when her son Angus is admitted to UHOP for temporary paralysis.

programme.title: Americas Got Talent
programme.desc: In the 20th season of this Emmy-nominated reality competition, the search continues for the countrys best talent. Howie Mandel, Sofía Vergara, and Simon Cowell return, joined by Mel B.

programme.title: Red Eye
programme.desc: Jess fears for her life when she becomes a target.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen
programme.desc: Joel McHale (Community) hosts this outrageous culinary guessing game where bakers must decode what type of dessert was made when all thats left are the crumbs, flour trails, and a few elusive clues.

programme.title: Chicago Med
programme.desc: When her former patient returns to Med, Goodwin learns that time doesnt heal all wounds. Frost and Charles treat a patient struggling with his sexuality.

programme.title: Alert: Missing Persons Unit
programme.desc: A thrilling finale. When a limousine with teenagers, including a senators son, is hijacked on the way to prom, MPU discovers that the ex-girlfriend of one of the victims may be the target.

programme.title: Americas Got Talent
programme.desc: In the 20th season of this Emmy-nominated reality competition, the search continues for the countrys best talent. Howie Mandel, Sofía Vergara, and Simon Cowell return, joined by Mel B.

programme.title: Law and Order: Organized Crime
programme.desc: A new wave of art activism puts the city on high alert and Vargas in the hot seat, Stabler is brought into a new unit to clear his old team from being their prime suspect.

programme.title: Law and Order Toronto: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A very tense season two premiere. When an unhoused man is stabbed to death in a downtown park, Graff and Bateman are called to investigate.

programme.title: And Just Like That...
programme.desc: Carrie unexpectedly extends her stay in Virginia. Aidan suggests she spend some time with his sons. Miranda follows Joys advice during an on-camera interview.

programme.title: Steinheist
programme.desc: The biggest corporate scandal in South African history, Steinhoffs fall, led to a loss of R200 billion.

programme.title: Landman
programme.desc: After a health scare, Monty puts Tommy in a tough position. Cooper comes up with a plan.

programme.title: Hacks
programme.desc: Deborah and Ava continue to try to get Late Night to rise in the ratings. Meanwhile, as Jimmy and Kayla attempt to rein in Dance Moms newfound success.

programme.title: Hacks
programme.desc: With the show stuck in third place, Deborah pitches a bold new strategy for Late Night. Nina arrives in LA with a plan to shake up Avas future.

programme.title: Based On A True Story
programme.desc: Ava investigates a crime scene and runs into an old friend. Nathan takes a giant financial risk for a chance at redemption. Ava channels the Lipinski sisters to help her understand more about the Westside Ripper.

programme.title: Based On A True Story
programme.desc: Ava and Nathan try to rekindle their relationship by going to a sex party, but Avas true motives are hidden, Matt is confronted by a fellow addict, Ava begins a new social experiment online.

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted
programme.desc: The Fugitive Task Force is sent on a hunt in Philadelphia to investigate a double homicide and the abduction of a 14-year-old girl in the foster care system.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: When a gunman opens fire at a homeless shelter in Astoria, the team is led toward a killer with connections to a Mexican cartel.

programme.title: Yellowjackets
programme.desc: The return of a Yellowjacket sparks a vengeful frenzy in the ill-tempered team. Lotties rendition of Cool Aunt Without Kids leaves Callie with an open door to answers about her mothers twisted past.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen
programme.desc: Joel McHale (Community) hosts this outrageous culinary guessing game where bakers must decode what type of dessert was made when all thats left are the crumbs, flour trails, and a few elusive clues.

programme.title: Summertide
programme.desc: Tristan wants to help Yolande dance again. Martins suspicions of Lourens grow, and he confronts Charlie. Estella convinces Rebecca with a plan to burn down Salt and Fire.

programme.title: Summertide
programme.desc: A major accident devastates the Field and Solomons families. The families come together to support each other in grief.

programme.title: Americas Got Talent
programme.desc: In the 20th season of this Emmy-nominated reality competition, the search continues for the countrys best talent. Howie Mandel, Sofía Vergara, and Simon Cowell return, joined by Mel B.

programme.title: Chicago Med
programme.desc: When her former patient returns to Med, Goodwin learns that time doesnt heal all wounds. Frost and Charles treat a patient struggling with his sexuality.

programme.title: Watson
programme.desc: Watson runs into a brilliant con artist and an old friend of Sherlock Holmes, Irene Adler, when her son Angus is admitted to UHOP for temporary paralysis.

programme.title: Carte Blanche
programme.desc: [GRAND UNDERTAKING] Pulling back the veil on the business of death. [MARKETPLACE MURDERS] When marketplace turns to murder. [K9 BOND] A dogged duo to the rescue.

programme.title: Survivor Australia: Australia V The...
programme.sub-title: Survivor Australia: Australia V The World. S12/E6 - My Fire Breathing Dragon
programme.desc: Australian and World Survivor heavyweights continue to clash on Moorditj tribe and the games most powerful new couple prepare to dominate.

programme.title: Americas Got Talent
programme.desc: In the 20th season of this Emmy-nominated reality competition, the search continues for the countrys best talent. Howie Mandel, Sofía Vergara, and Simon Cowell return, joined by Mel B.

programme.title: Law and Order: Organized Crime
programme.desc: A new wave of art activism puts the city on high alert and Vargas in the hot seat, Stabler is brought into a new unit to clear his old team from being their prime suspect.

programme.title: Harold And The Purple Crayon
programme.desc: A lively, warm-hearted fantasy comedy. Harold, whose magic crayon brings everything he draws to life, goes on an adventure after he draws himself off the page and into the real world.

programme.title: Happys Place
programme.desc: Bobbie reluctantly agrees to take Isabella to Happys house in search of a connection to their late father, leading to Bobbie worrying about what they may find.

programme.title: Chicago Med
programme.desc: Charles and Archer treat a heart transplant patient who believes his new heart doesnt want to be in his body. Lenox takes a personal day. Asher discovers a mass on a pregnant womans ovary.

programme.title: Americas Got Talent
programme.desc: In the 20th season of this Emmy-nominated reality competition, the search continues for the countrys best talent. Howie Mandel, Sofía Vergara, and Simon Cowell return, joined by Mel B.

programme.title: Elsbeth
programme.desc: A thrilling season finale. When Elsbeth tries to solve a murder, she comes face-to-face with many familiar suspects.

programme.title: Based On A True Story
programme.desc: Nathan plays a redemption match against a lifelong rival. The new serial killer haunting Los Angeles sends Ava a cipher to decode.

programme.title: Based On A True Story
programme.desc: Reeling from Nathans public embarrassment, he and Ava try to track down Drew. Matt and Tory plan their wedding ceremony. Matt gives into his dark desires.

programme.title: Based On A True Story
programme.desc: Matts past comes back to haunt Ava and Nathan. Ava realises her true crime obsession has become a dangerous addiction. When they try to leave it all behind, mysterious forces prevent them from escaping.

programme.title: Based On A True Story
programme.desc: In the season finale, Ava and Nathan find themselves on a game show with deadly stakes, while Tory and Matt are on the run from the police.

programme.title: The Radleys
programme.desc: A dark vampire horror comedy based on Matt Haigs novel. An ordinary family concealing a dark secret - they are vampires - has their secret uncovered, turning their lives upside down.

programme.title: Landman
programme.desc: Everything comes to a head in this fiery finale. Tommy and Cami discuss whether to gamble or play it safe. The cartel makes a move.

programme.title: Steinheist
programme.desc: The biggest corporate scandal in South African history, Steinhoffs fall, led to a loss of R200 billion.

programme.title: Isibaya
programme.desc: Whilst Samson looks forward to reaping the benefits of Mpiyakhes deal, Will Mkabayi find it in her heart to support her brother?

programme.title: Genesis
programme.desc: Bonko and Mmarona are forced to deal with the elephant in the room. Gabriel has found his next big star and Mrs. Hlophe is forced to eat humble pie when she realises, she may have jumped the gun.

programme.title: Suidooster
programme.desc: Mymoena unknowingly steps on Kaashifas toes, and Tino struggles to prepare for his debut as a comedian. Wade has a serious conversation with Elana, while Frankie and Garys fitness is put to the test.

programme.desc: Elise usurps a postcard from Karen. Conrad and Delias date night turns out to be a surprise of another kind, and a journalist gives Tertius new information about Rentia.

programme.desc: The Louws are worried that they dont know who is trying to intimidate them. Hazel tells the family about Christines offer. Wayne asks around town about a Bible quiz.

programme.desc: As Mpiyakhe and Samson go head to head in negotiations, Jackson gets more than he bargained for. How will Mpiyakhe react when he discovers Thandeka is in love with his enemys son?

programme.desc: Nandi is rushed to the hospital with her newborn. Meanwhile, Zole celebrates the new arrival with the family, but the weight of responsibility looms large over the household.

programme.desc: A potential groom wins the reluctant hearts of the brides parents. The Thabethes and Hlophes unite over dinner, while Nobuhles mission to unite a family spark explosive confrontation.

programme.desc: Sibusiso Steven Ncube is a devoted family man. He has been hijacked four times. The fourth incident was particularly traumatic. Hijacked by three men in Durban, he was moved from one location to another until nightfall.
